title: A Floral pageant
brief_description: Victoria celebrates 100 years of self government. Shots of the Royal Botanic Gardens, Government House, but mainly the procession along Elizabeth Street. Beginning title says “Presented by Ted Waterford”.
description: Victoria celebrates 100 years of self government. Shots of the Royal Botanic Gardens, Government House, but mainly the procession along Elizabeth Street. Beginning title says “Presented by Ted Waterford”.
